title: CoStar in Advanced Talks to Buy Hotel Data Provider STR
text:
The commercial real-estate data giant CoStar Group Inc. is in advanced talks to acquire STR Inc., one of the world’s largest hotel data companies, according to people familiar with the matter, in a deal likely to be valued at more than $400 million.

CoStar, which is the world’s biggest commercial property data company, with a market capitalization of about $21.5 billion, has focused primarily on selling data and analytic tools related to the office, industrial, retail and rental apartment markets.

...
